Header: Troops of 233 Brigade Clean Challathiv Beach Front
Content: Following guidelines given by Colonel R. Elvitigala, Commander 233 Brigade, troops of the 233 Brigade initiated a cleaning programme at Challathiv beach front on Monday (11). It was organized to educate the public on the importance of keeping the surroundings clean. Commanding Officer 6 Gajaba Regiment, Officers and troops attended the event.
